column4: hi there, i just upgraded to Maverick and my multiple monitor support stopped working... i got an external monitor + laptop's monitor - i now cannot move my mouse between the two and the laptop monitor is black. anyone seen anything similar?
is there a button on the laptop that looks like a monitor? it would probably be in the fxx buttons, as a special fn combo

indeed there is. and i can use it to switch between "image on monitor" "image on laptop" and "mirrored screens". ok, this is weird - i can get both monitors on, but only if i position the external monitor *below* the laptop... i suspect this is a compiz / GLX issue
that sounds right... subbimt a bug report
